tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ProviderInformation (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  contact_information VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  industry_standard_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ProviderInformation (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    industry_standard VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE FraudulentActivities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT REFERENCES ProviderInformation(provider_id),
    activity_description TEXT,
    detection_method VARCHAR(50),
    detection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FraudulentActivities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  standard_id INT,
  activity_description TEXT,
  activity_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ProviderComparison (
    comparison_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id UUID,
    standard_id UUID,
    comparison_result STRING,
    comparison_date TIMESTAMP
);
